long_description: Use the Hart elastic bandage to help stop bleeding, support sprains, reduce the spread of swelling and hold splints and sterile pads in place. Comes with two clips to secure bandage. Rolled size is 4" wide x 1.625" in diameter; relaxed length is 5 feet. Makes a versatile addition to any first-aid kit.
short_description: Use the Hart elastic bandage to help stop bleeding, support sprains, reduce the spread of swelling and hold splints and sterile pads in place.
